price: (ចូរអ្នកចងចាំអំពីរឿង)អ៊ីស្មាអ៊ីល អ៊ីទ្រីស និងហ៊្សុល គីហ្វលី គេទាំងអស់គឺស្ថិតក្នុងចំណោមអ្នកដែលអត់ធ្មត់។
arabic: وَإِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَإِدۡرِيسَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ كُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'māʿīla wa-id'rīsa wadhā al-kif'li kullun mina al-ṣābirīna
